data.actual_result: For the role color it shows "Disabled for everyone" and for the rest there is no text being shown
data.expected_result: All of these options will show some error regarding the highest role being below the role you're attempting to modify
data.short_description: Incorrect tooltip when attempting to edit a role higher than yours.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server with access to modifying permissions of the roles below you without your role being the highest one or being the owner - Go to the permissions of a role that is above your highest one - Hover over the color attribute or the rest of the permissions
